title: Roman armies cross the Adriatic. The Romance of History bids the Greeks of the homeland a long farewell. NOTE TO CHAPTER XI—THE “MIDDLE PARTY” AND ITS LEADERS There are five historical puzzles in the period 411-405 B.C., viz: (1) Alcibiades’ attitude to the Oligarchic Revolution of 411 B.C., i.e. his encouragement first, then his rebuff, of the “oligarchs”.
